Description:
Requirements:Native German national.
Option 1: Recent graduate with CA/CPA/ACCA certifications. Candidates who have recently obtained their CA/CPA/ACCA certifications are encouraged to apply.
Option 2: Minimum of 2 years of accounting experience.
Demonstrated experience in accounting, preferably in a similar role.
Prepare, examine, and analyze financial statements and reports to ensure accuracy and compliance with accounting standards.
Maintain organized and up-to-date financial records, including accounts payable and accounts receivable.
Assist in the preparation, monitoring, and management of budgets to support sound financial decision-making.
Strong understanding of accounting principles and regulations.
Proficiency in accounting software and Microsoft Office Suite, particularly Excel.Job Details
